definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: Objective To observe the distribution of the neuropeptides in mouse sublingual gland.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察小鼠舌下腺内神经肽的分布。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the projection from the vestibular nuclei to the spinal cord.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究大鼠前庭神经核群向脊髓的投射纤维特征。
是的，我有一点点的神经质。

sentences.english: Be that as it may， the nerve poison does its business with man far more quickly than the blood poison.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，神经毒液毒杀人类比血毒液快得多。

sentences.english: Conclusion The above procedure is necessary for the ankle sprains with the injury of the common peroneal nerve.
sentences.chinese: 结论踝扭伤出现腓总神经损伤者应作探查松解减压术。

sentences.english: Chronic conditions are managed equally well with chiropractic or yoga.
sentences.chinese: 慢性病通过脊神经疗法或者瑜伽均可获得显著疗效。

sentences.english: You have the nerve to call that fine?
sentences.chinese: 你为这个叫好，你神经错乱啊？

sentences.english: Pricks his thin claw within some delicate nerve;
sentences.chinese: 以尖刻的爪子，刺痛敏感的神经。

sentences.english: Purpose To study limb immobilization influencing on denervated muscle atrophy.
sentences.chinese: 结论肢体制动加速了失神经支配肌肉萎缩的发展。

sentences.english: This will activate your parasympathetic nervous system which will calm you down and slow your heart rate.
sentences.chinese: 这样能激活副交感神经，有助于安神和降低心率。

sentences.english: The cold-sensitive neuron was voltage dependent.
sentences.chinese: 该类神经元具有电压依赖性。

sentences.english: But on the excision throat nerve outside may cause patient's range to have the change.
sentences.chinese: 但切除喉上神经的外支可使患者的音域发生改变。

sentences.english: The doctor diagnosed my illness as neuralgia.
sentences.chinese: 医生诊断我的病是神经痛。

sentences.english: When it occurs in the back near the spinal cord or the nerve roots, it can be very painful.
sentences.chinese: 如果正好发生在脊椎或神经附近的话会非常痛苦。

sentences.english: Schwannomas and neurofibromas are benign lesions that are thought to arise from neoplastic transformation of nerve sheath cells.
sentences.chinese: 前两者是良性肿瘤，一般认为来自神经鞘细胞的瘤变。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the normal morphology of axons in brainstem .
sentences.chinese: 目的观察脑干组织中神经轴突的正常形态。
